Name: poor-audio-quality-on-call
Function: {"Version":"2022-11-25","RuleFunction":{"Operator":"AND","Operands":[{"Operator":"CONTAINS_ANY","Operands":["Could you please speak up","There's a lot of static on the line","I can't hear you","I can't make out your words"],"ComparisonValue":"$.ContactLens.PostCall.SemanticMatch.Transcript","FilterClause":{"LogicOperator":"AND","Filters":[{"Type":"ParticipantRole","Data":"ANY"}]},"Negate":false},{"Operator":"CONTAINS_ANY","Operands":["The line is breaking up","You're cutting out","You're sounding distant","Your voice is muffled"],"ComparisonValue":"$.ContactLens.PostCall.SemanticMatch.Transcript","FilterClause":{"LogicOperator":"AND","Filters":[{"Type":"ParticipantRole","Data":"AGENT"}]},"Negate":false},{"Operator":"CONTAINS_ANY","Operands":[[{"Type":"LIST","Value":[{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"can't hear"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"sound is not clear"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"difficult to hear you"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"audio keeps dropping"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"voice is fading"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"barely hear you"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"very quiet"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"poor connection"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"sounds like you're underwater"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"call quality is bad"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"a lot of background noise"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"try speaking louder"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"interference"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"voice is breaking up"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"distorted"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"sound is garbled"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"problem with the connection"}]}]],"ComparisonValue":"$.ContactLens.PostCall.PatternMatch.Transcript","FilterClause":{"LogicOperator":"AND","Filters":[{"Type":"ParticipantRole","Data":"AGENT"},{"Type":"PatternMatchLanguageFilter","Data":"EN"}]},"Negate":false}]}}
